attributes.action: Distribute liberally the rights and know-how of a successful Covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details:
Why?

Vast pools of unvaccinated populations in poor countries (until 2024 currently?) affording the virus plentiful opportunity to mutate and evolve is a threat to the UK.  

No normality in the UK until global vaccination anyway? - https://tinyurl.com/m3jkfc7t 

The economic self-interest of rich countries is to end the pandemic asap - https://tinyurl.com/4u49mh64 

Potentially save hundreds of thousands of lives globally.  

Support WHO goals - https://tinyurl.com/zv2ku4dp
attributes.background: Possibly in partnership with other rich countries, buy up the rights and know-how of the manufacture of a Covid vaccine. Then give these away for free, or to recoup costs licence out but liberally, to burst logjam so global production of vaccine can be ramped up to the maximum possible extent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564005

You may also like to sign these petitions which call for related actions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576325

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
